name: Estoril Gourmand Villa by Sol Domus
description: With its unique character and location in a quiet village, Estoril Gourmand Villa is a good holiday villa choice for exploring the Lisbon region and its surrounding area; close to the Estoril A5 motorway exit to Lisbon (20km), a 20 minute drive to Sintra, or a 30 minute walk into to the centre of Estoril, it is the perfect accommodation for those wishing to explore the Lisbon and surrounding area during their stay, and have all the comfort of a well equipped home with pool.
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the lovely and quiet village of Bicesse, within a two minute drive of the centre of Estoril, with its lovely sandy beaches and Cascais. Lisbon is easily reached from this large holiday villa by a pleasant coastal train ride in 20 minutes or by car (20km). Sintra is a bus ride away. Within the centre of the village (250m away from the villa) you will find plenty of useful services: supermarkets, pharmacies, baker and pastry shops, restaurants and banks, among others.

Estoril became famous during the Second World War as a safe haven for european nobility and spies. The beautiful chalets defining the landscape are a reminder from this grand era. Its micro climate is a constant attraction all year round, pleasantly hot in the summer and mild in winter.

The Estoril Casino is the largest in Europe and a popular attraction, as well as the arts and crafts fair, both within easy reach.

name: NEW Casa Guincho - with private saltwater pool
description: Casa Guincho is for lovers of nature, space, ocean and light. It is where your horizons expand as you sit in the garden with a glass of local wine and take in the breathtaking views over the green valley national park towards Guincho beach and the surrounding countryside.
neighborhood_overview: Charneca is a small and typical Portuguese village only 5 minutes’ drive from Cascais and 10 minutes from Estoril. The stunning Guincho beach (where you will be able to surf, windsurf, chill out at the beach bar or simply soak up the sun!) is a couple of minutes’ drive away, or 15-20 minutes’ walk from the house, through a beautiful green valley in the Sintra-Cascais Natural Park. In Charneca, there is a small supermarket, a couple of local cafés, a restaurant, an equestrian centre, a tennis court, as well as a bus stop.
host_about:
My Friends' Houses is a network of rental accommodation in the UK, Portugal, Greece, France and Bali. Despite the diverse scope of the holiday destinations the common thread is that all the homes available provide a cosy, well loved environment with on hand support and advice if required.
We work closely with all of our owners to ensure their houses meet a high standard. When our guests arrive at My Friends' Houses, they can immediately enjoy and relax! 
It is important to us that from the moment you put down your suitcase you feel comfortable and able to kick back and enjoy your holiday.

All our houses are handpicked and the regions we work with are well known to us. This way, we can give real advice to our guests and make them feel like staying at a “Friend’s House”.
We offer a variety of activities and places where you will be able to go and be received “like a friend”.  We can recommend the best contacts for yoga, surfing, kite-surfing, paddle boarding, eco tourism and bird watching, sailing, trekking, horse-riding, tennis, massages and beauty treatments, cultural and historical tours as well as amazing gastronomic experiences!
Anything else you fancy, let us know and we will find a way to provide it!
We look forward to welcoming you at “My Friends’ Houses”.

name: West Coast Surf Hostel-red
description:
The Hostel is a lovely and typical lodge, full of history and tradition, completely refurbished into a fully equipped Surf Hostel to welcome anyone who wants to surf and visit Praia da Areia Branca and all the Peniche area.
Outside the Surf Hostel you can find relaxing areas, a grill area that delights those who enjoy Bbq´s, an outside shower to undress the wetsuits under warm water, a reception where you can rent surf gear and a yoga studio.
host_about:
Hi,
My friends describe me as an easy fiable person.
I grew up In Praia da Areia Branca in the Portuguese West Coast where i learned to surf and became surf instructor
Im also a practitioner and a yoga Instructor.
My global ecological concerns with the gmo´s and monsanto´s and also my spiritual belives made me vegetarian.
That´s it :)

name: The Count
description: The Count is ready to be your home in Oeiras historic Center, only 10 minutes walk to the sandy beach of Santo Amaro and nestled between two beautiful parks. With XVIII century charm and very sunny, The Count was renovated keeping its original hardwood floors and with modern amenities - Nespresso, washer/dryer, high-speed Wifi, mosquito nets on windows, Cable TV, HBO. We subcontract professional cleaning and laundry services and we follow updated health and safety protocols. Read the reviews!
neighborhood_overview:
The Count enjoys a unique location, on the pedestrian street that connects the Palace of Marquis de Pombal (who was also the first Count of Oeiras) to the Church central square, and about 10 minutes walk to the wide sandy beach of Santo Amaro de Oeiras and the Oeiras boardwalk. You can stroll to the marina where you can rent bicycles, kayaks or boats, schedule diving trips and many other activities - or where you can just simply sit at a terrace and enjoy the ocean views.
The city park and the Palace gardens, just steps from the apartment, are both stunning manicured parks where you can walk around, appreciate the exquisite flowers, listen to birds, walk, jog, read a book or have a picnic.
The historic center and the marina boast a diverse and high quality offer of restaurants (take out and terraces) and, just up the street, the famous Don Pavilli, awarded best gelato in Portugal!
Also very near you have the farmers market, bakery, pharmacy, fish monger and a supermark
host_about:
We lived many years abroad (ask us where!) and 5 years ago we moved back to Portugal - we picked the town of Oeiras, the best place in the world for our amazing children to grow up in! They say there's no place like home and it's really true for us, we are so happy here! Our new home is just outside Lisbon, in a little known gem called old town Oeiras :)
Catarina has a business consulting and non-profit background, has recently published a novel and is the proud owner of the best Nail Spa in Lisbon. Rui is a talented architect and certified chef! We love traveling, dancing, meeting people, teaching and learning from our kids, and we're also happy to just sit back with a glass of fine wine after the little ones go to bed, absorbing all the sunset tones. Fast pace, slow pace, there's time for everything. Life is magical and we try to make the best of it, wherever it may be!
neighbourhood_cleansed: Oeiras e S.Julio da Barra, Pao de Arcos e Caxias

name: Casa das Barcas - Suite Fragata
description:
Casa das Barcas is a hidden retreat on the Silver Coast in western Portugal, with ample sea views just a 5-minute walk to Porto de Barcas Beach.
We have 7 comfortable and bright Suites, modern in style with rustic-inspired details, and an incredible view of the Atlantic Ocean and Berlengas, which promise the well-deserved rest of those who visit us.
Come and watch the sun set with us every day in the Atlantic, and experience this fantastic landscape.
neighborhood_overview:
Casa das Barcas is just a few kilometres from Dino Parque Lourinhã,
which is Portugal's largest open-air museum. Inserted in an area of 10 hectares, including 4 routes corresponding to some of the most important times in Earth's history: The end of the Paleozoic, The Triasic, The Jurassic and The Cretaceous.

Along these paths visitors can observe more than 120 full-scale models of dinosaurs and other animals.

In addition to the outdoor routes, an exhibition can be visited at the Lourinhã Museum, displaying its fantastic collection of paleontological discoveries. In the laboratory it is also possible to observe, live, the preparation of fossils.

name: Cottage to relax and discover central Portugal
description: Halfway between Lisbon and Santarém, where Estremadura begins to give way to Ribatejo, Quinta do Casal de Santo António, located in the municipality of Alenquer, is a rural property from the late 18th century, whose comfort and family atmosphere make it an excellent destination for some days of rest and leisure. You will also be well settled if you come to work in this region.
neighborhood_overview:
Due to its central location and excellent road access, Quinta do Casal de Santo António can be the starting point to visit Lisbon, Cascais, Sintra, Mafra, Santarém, Évora, Óbidos, Nazaré, Alcobaça, Fátima, Batalha and Tomar, some of the main tourist attractions in the centre of Portugal, all within a 30 to 60 minute drive.

Walking around the village of Alenquer and the picturesque villages in search of its rich historical heritage, enjoying nature in pleasant walks in the Serra do Montejunto, visiting the vineyards and the quintas of the region, tasting the wines that are produced there, are some of the activities that you can also do during your stay at Quinta do Casal de Santo António.
host_about:
I am a family man, married and with three teenage children.
I am a law graduate, but I work as a consultant and researcher on history and heritage.  I have already published several articles and some books and I spend many days on archives and libraries. And of course I like to travel and to know other places.
Therefore, welcoming travelers into our home is a natural consequence of all this.

neighborhood_overview:
The Anjos neighborhood is next to the famous Almirante Reis Avenue. Know for important Neoclassic and modernist building´s nowadays lives a multicultural atmosphere , being one of the most sought after by young couples.
Nowadays the neighborhood is well know for their cultural activities diversity . With several cinema sessions, concerts, dance class and various sports.
One of the great attractions is the ceramic Fábrica de Cerâmica Viúva de Lamego an old and famous ceramic factory, located in Largo do Intendente. This century building is lined with tiles and is one of the excilibris of the city that you cannot miss.

name: Cascais Riviera 72 Apartment by Sol Domus
description:
Welcome to our newly refurbished 3 bedroom Cascais Riviera Apartment by Sol Domus! The apartment is bright and spacious and has air conditioning in all rooms. Situated on the first floor of a small building that only has 3 apartments, it is very quiet and intimate. There is a private 60m2 terrace and separate study in the upper floor.

Located in a residential area in Cascais, Guia, in a very quiet one-way street. Hi-speed 500mps internet makes this the ideal apartment for work-holiday stays.
neighborhood_overview:
Within walking distance of the centre of Cascais and all its amenities, the apartment is situated in the very sought after Guia residential area in Cascais, a short walk from Casa da Guia and its magnificent cliff-top restaurants. The Ocean is 500m away and the beautiful coastal walk links the Centre of Cascais in one direction and Guincho beach in the other.
There is a small local shopping centre walking distance, as well as a local children playground 2 minutes walk.

The delightful Casa da Guia by the sea with its shops and restaurants is a pleasant stroll away; Casa da Guia is a truly magical place.
The charming, historic town centre of Cascais is a pleasant 20 minutes stroll, or 3 minutes by car. There is plenty to visit such as restaurants, nightlife, cultural events, cinemas with films in English and shopping.
This property is ideally situated for those wanting to take a break with plenty to do but without having to rent a car.

name: Diamond in the rough
description: Perfectly located and fully equipped two-bedroom apartment, 200m from Praia d´Areia Branca and with several dining options just a short walk away. It is ideal for anyone who is looking for a relaxing, but fun-filled holiday, whether at the beach or countryside. There are enough activities to keep you satisfied, such as surfing, SUP, diving, fishing and even mini-golf (just around the corner)Do you enjoy a little culture? Experience the magic of the Silver Coast for yourself, you won't regret it!
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located 200m from the beach. Praia da Areia Branca is a small town located 6km from the main town Lourinha. It is a calm and quiet town for an amazing stress free vacation or small get away. Those who enjoy some activities have a mini golf course close by to the apartment, surf schools if wanting lessons, a workout circuit and some trails to take relaxing long walks by the beach, there is something for everyone! If you have kids there is a Dino park just 3km from town. But if you want to explore the Silver coast a bit more, why not take a short drive to Peniche, Obidos( Medival Castle) or even Buda Eden in Bombarral.
What ever your holiday needs you will find it here. Come Experience It!!

name: Flor Liz
description: Apartment in the historic area of Lisbon, next to Graça square, close to the main tourist attractions of Lisbon. The apartment offers relaxed atmosphere with all the necessary comforts.
neighborhood_overview:
Graça is one of the most beautiful and ancient neighborhoods of the Portuguese capital.
This neighborhood is located next to the impudent São Jorge Castle, which provides its visitors with a wonderful and superb view. In this neighborhood there are two well-known viewpoints, Miradouro da Graça and Miradouro da Senhora do Monte.
It is an area that appeals not only to the local inhabitants, but also to the foreigners, being very rich and diverse containing wide viewpoints ranging from the simplest of residences to the most imposing palace.

name: Lisbon Canaan Boutique Apartments: Fanqueiros114
description:
Welcome to our Apartment!
Our Apartment is in Lisbon downtown area, close to the river Tagus, and to the castle.
It's a 129 m2 Apartment with 3 bedroom, 2 complete bathrooms, kitchen, living and dining room. The decoration is modern, but cosy! Air Conditioning, WiFi are provided.
The Apartment is in the 1st floor of the Fanqueiros Building, renovated in 2016. It has an elevator on the ground floor.
Fanqueiros is managed by Downtown Lovers, with more 80 Apartments in Lisbon and Porto.
neighborhood_overview:
Downtown Lisbon is an 18th-century district, completely rebuilt after the 1755 earthquake which had destroyed most of it. It was Europe's worst-recorded earthquake but it also led to the continent's first neoclassical urban planning with the world's first large-scale earthquake-proof construction.
Its grid was given precise geometric specifications and each street was named after different trades (shoes, gilding, saddlery, gold, and silver).
In the 20th century most of the buildings were taken over by banks and offices, deserting the area of residents, who moved up to the Avenidas Novas district. Many of the buildings were eventually left abandoned, but the neighborhood is now being reborn as a commercial and tourist area.
Some of the streets are pedestrianized and connect a number of monumental neoclassical squares, from Rossio and its cafés to the waterfront Praça do Comércio overlooked by a triumphal arch, to the attractive Praça do Município.

neighborhood_overview: Going down from *Calçada da Estrela*, the 28 famous Tram, slows down to pass in *Rua do Poço dos Negros*, gaining a new rejoice before rising into Chiado. Located in one of the most traditional areas of the city, close to *Rua de São Paulo*, in the transition between Santos and Bairro Alto neighborhoods, *Rua do Poço dos Negros* has always been an important axis in the city centre, integrating an area of commercial activities and services. Despite its centrality, as many of the traditional streets of downtown Lisbon, *Rua do Poço dos Negros* suffered an abandonment in the last decades with consequences in the disappearance of local trade and degradation of the built heritage. Nowadays a renew attention to the city of Lisbon, has enhanced its tourist and cosmopolitan character, opening up new opportunities to external visitors and investors. name: Vila intendente - Apartamento 2 Quartos e Piscina!
description:
Explore Lisbon from one of the city's most vibrant neighborhoods! Located in the heart of the Intendente, an area in constant renovation with a multicultural atmosphere, our apartment offers a perfect base for your stay in the Portuguese capital.
A 10-minute walk from the center of town, our spacious two-bedroom apartment is ideal for you.
Enjoy relaxing moments in the communal pool as you plan your adventures through the charming Lisbon.
neighborhood_overview:
Largo do Intendente:

Deeply renovated in the last decade, Largo do Intendente has become one of Lisbon's most iconic sites due to its rich cultural diversity as well as the abundance of restaurants and bars. Here, visitors can explore a variety of shops offering typical Portuguese products, such as the renowned Viúva Lamego tile shop and the fascinating decoration shop A Vida Portuguesa. Largo do Intendente is the epicenter of a neighborhood that resembles the famous China Town, with a vibrant fusion of Eastern and Portuguese cultures, especially along the streets of Benformoso, Palma and Martim Moniz.

Be sure to try: An unforgettable meal at the famous Marisqueira Cervejaria O Ramiro.
host_about:
Somos a Margarida, a Joana, e a Marta, faremos o nosso melhor para tornar a sua estadia memorável!

Estaremos sempre contactáveis por telefone para fornecer todas  as respostas para as suas perguntas!

Esperamos por si em Lisboa!

name: Sonel Investe Madalena 287 Boutique Apartments 3
description:
Our apartment is situated in the heart of downtown Lisbon – Baixa, in a building completely rebuilt in 2015. The apartment has a modern but comfortable decoration with all small details to make you feel HAPPY!
Hope you enjoy your stay with us!
neighborhood_overview:
As the apartment is situated in downtown Lisbon, you have everything within a walking distance: cafes and restaurants, supermarkets, pharmacies, shops, transport, as well as the main tourist attractions.
•Chiado (fashion neighborhood): 10 minutes walking
•Bairro Alto (night/bars/restaurants neighborhood): 10 minutes
• 28 Tram: 5 minutes walking
•Alfama (historical neighborhood): 10 minutes
•Castle of São Jorge: 10 minutes
•Avenida da Liberdade (Lisbon´s main avenue): 10 minutes
•Train to Cascais / Belém: 15 minutes
•Train to Sintra: 5 minutes
host_about:
The Sonel Investe group has a collection of quality accommodation in Lisbon, in a prime area of the city in the heart of downtown Lisbon.
It offers accommodation in the form of studios, 1 bedroom apartments, and 2 bedroom apartments.
Managed by Get Your Stay Property Management Team. An experienced and very available team that works with the aim of making guests' stay as pleasant as possible.
We are 24H /365 days a year available to welcome you!

name: YELLOW ROOM - STANDARD TWIN
description:
Room with twin beds. It is situated on the 1st floor, accessible by stairs. It has its own en-suite bathroom with tub / shower.
This room gives onto an inner courtyard of the house, facing south.
neighborhood_overview:
There are many palaces and gardens of interest to visit within a short distance of the house, and within half an hour you can be in the city of Lisbon with all its Historical buildings, or in the night life of Estoril and Cascais, or on the beaches which surround the coastal area of Sintra.
Sintra, classified as a World Heritage Site by UNESCO, was the first site to acquire the designation of Cultural Landscape for preserving its fundamental integrity, untouched testimony of successive cultures / civilizations that have passed here, in a course with 7,000 years of history.-
host_about:
Na Quinta de São Thiago os hóspedes são tratados não apenas como clientes, mas sobretudo como amigos e família.
O nosso objectivo é proporcionar-lhe uma estadia inesquecível!
Sentimos um enorme orgulho pelas centenas de comentários deixados pelos hóspedes no Livro de Honra, ao longo destes 30 anos de actividade.
É aconselhável trazer um carro, pois a quinta fica cerca de 6 quilómetros distante do centro histórico. Por essa mesma razão, somos o local ideal para desfrutar da tranquilidade que procura!

Would you like to rent a classic VW Bulli for your road trip through Portugal? Then you are just right with Jürgen!
With its beautiful paintwork and the white wall tyres, it is a real eye-catcher! In the interior, with a complete kitchen, the cozy bed and plenty of storage space, you have all the options for your trip.

name: Amazing apartment on the beach
description: Modern apartment with sea views located in the centre of Praia da Areia Branca, just steps from the beach. The apartment is located in a complex built a few years ago and separated from the beach by a street with parking lots. As our guests you have free access to the swimming pool which is located in the middle of the building. The property is ideal for single travelers, couples and families. It sleeps up to four people.
neighborhood_overview:
Praia da Areia Branca has a beautiful wide and endless sandy beach with some rocks on the northern part. Beach walks are especially worthwhile at low tide. You can observe marine animals between the rocks. When the weather is appropriate you have a beautiful view up to Peniche and the islands of Berlengas.
The area is a surfers paradise. Directly in front of the building complex you will find two surf schools offering courses for beginners and advanced surfers. If you wish we help to get in contact with them before your arrival. Other surf or kitesurfing schools and surfing beaches are located in Peniche (beaches: Supertubos or Baleal), in Ericeira and at other beaches near Praia da Areia Branca. The distance to Peniche is about 16 km, Ericeira about 45 km.
For diving we recommend the nature reserve of the islands of Berlengas. Diving tours to this area rich on animals start from Peniche. They mostly take a whole day and lead to wrecks, caves etc. - a real exciting experience

Eduardo is a developed T4 camper with plenty of space and features such as water filters, solar cells, more ecologically degradable garbage bags and soap to be as environmentally friendly as possible ( so that the beautiful beaches of Portugal remain exactly these;)

Kind regards, Mario

name: Beach & surf & wine & golf
description:
Apartment located 2 minutes walking distance from the beach, Hotel Noah and from center of the village. Santa Cruz, with its long white sand beaches and unforgettable sunset has also a traditional market with excellent fish, and vegetables from the region.
Close to Sta. Cruz you will find beautiful vineyards and several wineries to visit, such as Adega Mãe or Quinta da Almiara
Ribeira d' Ilhas, the surf lovers paradise and Ericeira, with its excellent seafood restaurants are just 20 min drive.

Sentimos um enorme orgulho pelas centenas de comentários deixados pelos hóspedes no Livro de Honra, ao longo destes 30 anos de actividade.
É aconselhável trazer um carro, pois a quinta fica cerca de 6 quilómetros distante do centro histórico. Por essa mesma razão, somos o local ideal para desfrutar da tranquilidade que procura!

name: SUITE
description: It is located on the 1st floor, with access via stairs and next to the Pink room. The sitting-area, with large windows, has a balcony. It has breathtaking views of the mountains, the garden and pool, and facing west.
neighborhood_overview:
There are many palaces and gardens of interest to visit within a short distance of the house, and within half an hour you can be in the city of Lisbon with all its Historical buildings, or in the night life of Estoril and Cascais, or on the beaches which surround the coastal area of Sintra.
Sintra, classified as a World Heritage Site by UNESCO, was the first site to acquire the designation of Cultural Landscape for preserving its fundamental integrity, untouched testimony of successive cultures / civilizations that have passed here, in a course with 7,000 years of history.

name: West Coast Surf Hostel
description:
The Hostel is a lovely and typical lodge, full of history and tradition, completely refurbished into a fully equipped Surf Hostel to welcome anyone who wants to surf and visit Praia da Areia Branca and all the Peniche area.
Outside the Surf Hostel you can find relaxing areas, a grill area that delights those who enjoy Bbq´s, an outside shower to undress the wetsuits under warm water, a reception where you can rent surf gear and a yoga studio.
host_about:
Hi,
My friends describe me as an easy fiable person.
I grew up In Praia da Areia Branca in the Portuguese West Coast where i learned to surf and became surf instructor
Im also a practitioner and a yoga Instructor.
My global ecological concerns with the gmo´s and monsanto´s and also my spiritual belives made me vegetarian.
That´s it :)

name: Terra Lodge -Oficina (Casa 5)
description: Terra Lodge is an author project that arises from the dream of sharing the taste for nature, the sea, the sun, the little good things of life. There are 6 small houses, which share a community kitchen, a garden, a vegetable garden, a swimming pool and more nooks and crannies.
neighborhood_overview:
Terra Lodge is located in Santo Isidoro, a typical Portuguese rural village, 800 metres from Praia de Ribeira D'Ilhas, a natural surf reserve, unique in Europe and 5 kilometres from Ericeira.

In a green valley sheltered from the wind, blessed by the sun 300 days a year, you can hear the church bell ring every hour, the birds singing, in a royal village with all its grace, simplicity and peace, just 30 minutes from Lisbon, a vibrant city, fresh full of light, color and history.
host_about: Estou disponível para ajudar no que for preciso!

name: Casal Tiroliro in Colares, Sintra - By Sol Domus
description:
Casal Tiroliro is a completely renovated, century old holiday villa 20 minutes from Praia das Maçãs beach. The views to the rear are of unspoilt pine woods. The house is very comfortable and private and it is perfect for relaxed family holidays.

At the back of the house we find the lawned garden, sprinkled with lavender and rosemary bushes. This is an ideal spot for children’s games or simply to relax and read a book.
neighborhood_overview:
Located by renowned “Praia Grande” beach, the house affords total privacy, and is set in a peaceful pine wood. The area is part of the Sintra-Cascais National Park, where building is restricted and nature protected, with countryside stretching in all directions.

Please note: according to the current Portuguese regulations, any type of fire, including barbecues and campfires, are prohibited within 30 meters of buildings and 300 meters of forests, cornfields, timber, hay and other flammable substances in order to avoid wildfires.

Cascais Riviera 88 Garden is located in one of the best residential areas of Cascais, Guia. The spacious vacation apartment in Cascais has access to a bright garden with a shared swimming pool. The villa is ideal for indoor-outdoor living!

Air conditioned throughout, Cascais Riviera 88 Garden has been fully refurbished in 2019. It provides the ideal setting for a convivial vacation with everything close-by.
neighborhood_overview:
Cascais Riviera 88 Garden is situated in the very sought after Guia residential area in Cascais.
A short walk from Casa da Guia and its magnificent cliff-top restaurants. The Ocean is 1000m away and the beautiful coastal walk links the Centre of Cascais in one direction and Guincho beach in the other.

name: Sunny & Fully Equipped 2BR Near Jardim da Estrela
description: Experience the best of Lisbon from our sunny 1st floor 2-bedroom apartment located behind the gorgeous Basilica da Estrela. Enjoy the convenience of our cozy open kitchen and catch a glimpse of the Basilica da Estrela from the front balcony. Ideal for families and groups up to 4 people, this 72sqm fully equipped space with a spacious walk-in closet is a cozy retreat near the famous Jardim da Estrela and the 28 tram line. Immerse yourself in Lisbon's charm from our tranquil abode!
neighborhood_overview: The Estrela / Lapa district is beautiful, quiet and full of surprises. The basilica and the park are sublime and worth a visit on their own. Lots of small local restaurants and award-winning restaurants (Loco, 1 Michelin star) are less than 100m from the apartment. The districts of Sao Bento, Campo de Ourique, Principe Real, Santos or Cais do Sodre are a few minutes away by foot or tram (tram 28 passes just next to the apartment)
host_about:
Hi! I’m John, I’m from the US and love to travel, meet interesting people, and experience new food and culture. 

My wife Rose and I work in the humanitarian sector and currently live in Ankara, Turkey with our 2 year old daughter and our Anatolian Shepherd. We have a a house in Vermont, USA and apartment in Lisbon, Portugal that we rent out while we're not using them. We hope you enjoy them as much as we do.

name: Studio in historical center of Lisbon 2A
description:
Bright Charming Studio, with a timeless elegant, clean & intimate atmosphere. equipped and with self-catering faciliies, the studios offer you the ultimate premium comfort at a Lisbon approach.
The house locates in the heart of Lisbon city close to subway station and surrounded by very typical street of Lisbon.
neighborhood_overview: Baixa-Chiado subway station is 750 meters from Apartments and Cais do Sodré 1.0 km away. The nearest airport is Humberto Delgado Airport, in Lisbon, 9.0 km from the property. name: Charming & Relaxing Family House - Colares, Sintra
description:
Complete villa in good condition, consisting of 3 bedrooms, bathroom, kitchen, garden, swimming pool, barbecue, garage and a magnificent terrace situated in the pine forest of Banzão, in Praia das Maças. Located 5 minutes from the center of Praia das Maçâs and Praia Grande, where you will find beach, and a full services area and restaurants.
Rental includes TV services, WiFi Internet as well as basic service costs such as Electricity / Water.
neighborhood_overview: PRAIA DAS MAÇAS: Golden sandy beach and mouth of the river that gives its name, it is said that in autumn the river carried to the beach many apples from the farms that crossed, giving the name to the beach. It has an extensive beach, providing the practice of beach sports, so it is very popular with water sports enthusiasts, such as bodyboarding and surfing. Around the 250-meter long sandy beach, several shops have been set up, from restaurants to cafes and bars, as well as local handicraft houses, making the place a meeting point for Sintrenses, who enjoy its terraces. and the great food, summer or winter. By the beach there is a saltwater pool, a children's playground and picnic space. At the ends of the beach, either on the left or right side, there are slabs / rocks where you can fish with some stability. Apart from the beach, one of the attractions of this area is the famous tram ride, again in activity. The route starts in the Estefânia area, next to the Sintra Museum of Modern

name: Mia's house - Stylish apartment in Monte Estoril
description:
Bathed in plenty of natural light, boasting windows in each division (with the exception of the bathroom) this apartment sleeps 4 people. Two people accommodated in the spacious double bed in private bedroom and two in the fold out sleeper couch in the lounge area.
Equipped with modern amenities, this apartment ensures a hassle-free stay. Your super-host Mia is only a phone-call away, ensuring a wonderfully memorable stay.
neighborhood_overview:
Closer to home in the leafy, tree-lined neighbourhood of Monte Estoril, you're spolit for choice with a host of delectable delights to choose from. Enjoy a creamy cappuccino at the cosy café "Sabóia" accompanied by either a Pastel de Nta or a delicious Bola de Berlim.
Should you wish to embibe in a piping hot coffee or tea in the crisp Autumn air, a stroll to the end of the lane will find you at the lovely "Jardim dos Passarinhos", where you could bag a bargain at one of the weekly second hand fairs.
If Fairs are your thing, be sure to visit Cascais, enjoy some roasted chestnuts and enjoy an outdoor fair, which is held twice a week.
On a savoury note, should you wish to sample, that staple of the Portuguese diet, the grilled Sardine, a leisurely stroll do "O Sinaleiro" will take care of all your lunch and dinner needs.
host_about:
Sou licenciada em História e pós graduada em Estudos Africanos. Escrevo livros infantis e poesia. Adoro viajar. 
Fui professora durante vários anos.
Fui directora de uma ONG em África.
Sou criativa, sociável, dou valor à organização, pontualidade, compromissos e honestidade.
Sou apreciadora da gastronomia, de vinhos, de boa conversa e bom humor.

neighborhood_overview: The location is the best! CHIADO.Since 1755 the Chiado is the artistic and elegant neighborhood of Lisbon. Not far from the ruins of the monastery Carmo, founded in 1389, the terrace of the famous bar A Brasileira is the ideal place to take a cup: Fernando Pessoa was used to coming to write here.Near we find the House Havaneza which is a consacrated establishment to the art of smoking cigars. Another well known place is the Confeitaria National, founded in 1829. To visit the Chiado take in the Rossio the rua gave Carmo: you will discover one of the curiosities of the capital, the elevator of santa Justa. It is a metallic elevator 45 meters high activated old by a steam engine. Since the upper platform you will enjoy an unique panoramic view.
host_about:
I am Madalena.
I know that chosing the right pace to spend our holidays is not an easy task to make, that’s why we look forward to helping you make the best choice, depending on your wishes, by providing clear information. 

Take a LOOK – Then BOOK!

description:
With a privileged location in Baixa Pombalina, a 5-minute walk from the Tagus River and Praça do Comércio, these fully equipped apartments are designed for a leisure holiday, a business visit or an extended stay.
Historical monuments, the eclecticism and vibrancy of the country's capital, and the inspiration of the Bordallo Pinheiro brand combine modernity and tradition in a welcoming space, with direct access to concept stores, restaurants, bars, museums, art galleries, and more.

name: Cascais Family & Friends
description:
Clean & Safe certificacion.
Beautiful and cosy apartment in Cascais, with 2 bedrooms at a peaceful local neighbourhood. Our sunny and clean apartment was recently renovated and decorated to provide a perfect stay. 15 minutes walk to the centre of Cascais and between the south & west beaches. With all amenities for your stay, including Cable Tv, Wi-fi and free street parking.
Ideal to visit Cascais, Sintra or Lisbon with the family or friends. Just 25 min by car or train to Lisbon.
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is a residential area and very peaceful. Here you can find several type of convenience stores, like small groceries, restaurants, laundry, ironing, hairdresser, seamstress, shoe repair, magazine shop. Close to the apartment there is a typical Portuguese cafe where you can take a coffee, lunch or take away food.
In front of the apartment there is a free parking always with a place, and a nice green garden with pick-nick tables.
host_about: My name is Hugo. I’m Portuguese, married with 2 kids. My wife is from Cascais and since the moment I met this wonderful place I get in love. We have been living outside of Portugal but we love to come and see our family & friends. We renovate a nice and sunny apartment in a local neighborhood that aloud to have the better experience to visit Cascais, Sintra and Lisbon, always having the sea and the river near. Feel free to contact me for any additional information.

neighborhood_overview:
Location

Within walking distance of the centre of Cascais and all its amenities, Cascais Riviera Villa is situated in the very sought after Guia residential area in Cascais, a short walk from Casa da Guia and its magnificent cliff-top restaurants. The Ocean is 1000m away and the beautiful coastal walk links the Centre of Cascais in one direction and Guincho beach in the other.
The charming, historic town centre of Cascais is a pleasant 20 minutes stroll, or 3 minutes by car. There is plenty to visit such as restaurants, nightlife, cultural events, cinemas with films in English and shopping.
This property is ideally situated for those wanting to take a break with plenty to do but without having to rent a car.

Guincho Beach

name: Standard  One Bedroom Apartment
description:
Dear Guests,

Month of JUNE

The streets come alive with the sounds of traditional Portuguese tunes, the city streets are invaded by the smell of grilled sardines and basil.

Please note that Sitio dos Cavaleiros Apartments is located in the center of these festivities that include music playing late into the night, especially on weekends and some weekdays. The joyful melodies can continue until 3 AM, adding to the unique charm and excitement of the event.
neighborhood_overview:
Mouraria, the old street of Graça
It is one of the oldest and most traditional neighborhoods in Lisbon where 57 nationalities live.
It’s there that Sítio dos Cavaleiros is located, integrated in Baixa de Lisboa, where many tourist attractions come together, of what is the city of “Sete Colinas”.
This area is also very central with several services and transport to reach any part of the city and surrounding regions.
host_about: Com o conceito de alojamento local de charme, o Sítio dos Cavaleiros quer que se sinta verdadeiramente em casa, por isso disponibiliza um ambiente familiar e acolhedor, mas igualmente exclusivo e personalizado, no coração de Lisboa. Em cada estadia tem o compromisso de acolher, acompanhar e cuidar quem o visita, através de serviços de excelência que proporcionam experiências positivas e de bem-estar.

name: Moderno Apartamento em Bairro típico Lisboeta
description:
Modern apartment completely refurbished in a typical Lisbon building, in a neighborhood historically alfacinha, thought to live Lisbon nearby.
The proximity of important historical landmarks (Pantheon, flea market, Graça), the main means of transport (metro and train at 500m) and the available offer of services at the door make the perfect location for those who want to get to know Lisbon without a car.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a typical neighborhood Lisboeta, Santa Apolónia, offering restaurants, grocery stores, coffees and other services less than 100m away.
Its location also allows you to visit emblematic sites such as the National Pantheon, the flea market, the viewpoints of Graça, the monastery of São Vicente, etc.

name: *Private room w/ an exclusive wc*
description:
**FULL HOUSE AVAILABLE for vacation**
One room with personal bathroom for exclusive use of guests, bright, spacious, comfortable and with basic services.

Living room and kitchen in open space with lots of natural light and plants.

The apartment is in the family neighborhood of Carcavelos, 10 minutes walk to the beach, 5 minutes from Carcavelos train station, 2 km from NSBE, next to supermarkets, pharmacy and Quinta da Alagoa park.

Easy access to Lisboa, Estoril, Cascais and Sintra.
neighborhood_overview: Carcavelos is a beach town just outside of Lisboa and has a cute local feel combined with the healthy lifestyle of living by the beach and ocean. Being closeby to the mountains of Sintra, the beautiful village of Cascais and all the wonderful places to explore along the coastline. With Carcavelos beach being a 10 minute walk away, it is a nice spot to enjoy some free time, relax, soak up the sun, skate, climb, swim, walk, cycle and so on...

description:

It's a new apartment, located in an old central Lisbon neighborhood. It has the charm of families who sit by the patio in the sun, kittens staring at the window, and the charming of the old Lisbon who lived in a community. The place is quiet and safe

name: 1° Odivelas Big Private Room/Close to Metro
description: If you are planning a stay in Lisbon and you are looking for a place where to share good company and great energy, we have the right solution for you! We have a full equipped room where you will be able to put your own energy to make yourself comfortable and to feel home. We live close to a big market that opens every monday, 2 minutes away walking from home, and we have many little shops all around, outdoor gym 2 minute walk, bus stop 200 meters away and metro station 11 minute walk.
host_about:
Nata e cresciuta nell'isola di Sicilia, in Italia, sono sempre stata circondata dalla fluida energia dell'acqua e del mare e fin da piccola ho mostrato interesse per il movimento ed il "tocco".
Questa passione mi ha portato in un viaggio di esplorazione di diverse aree come la ginnastica artistica, il kung fu, l'arrampicata, la capoeira, la danza, l'acroyoga, lo yoga, il sound-healing e la meditazione.
Avendo come base la mia laurea in Medicina, ho dato supporto alla mia ricerca nell'ambito del movimento e del bodywork sempre consapevole delle diverse forme e possibilità con cui si può esprimere il concetto di "cura". E' stato così che ho finalmente cominciato ad insegnare Acroyoga e Thai Massage nel 2017.
Ho incontrato nel massaggio tailandese una forma per connettermi alla parte più profonda di me stessa, sia dando un massaggio, che ricevendolo, o insegnando.
Vedo il massaggio tailandese come una pratica di meditazione e di cura complementare alla medicina tradizionale, sia per me che per gli altri.  

Consapevole che la cura comincia da una connessione profonda con noi stessi, il mio obiettivo oggi è favorire questa connessione attraverso l'arte del "tocco consapevole".

name: São Julião Family Beach Home
description:
My home is in a very quiet neighbour 600 metres from São Julião Beach and 8 Km from Ericeira centre.

São Julião: A beach and a village crossed by a river which marks the borders of Sintra Natural Park.

This is a little oasis in the middle of nature next to the sea and Ericeira. We are literally in the middle of nature. It's surrounded by hills, lush valleys, rivers and dramatic cliffs bordering the Atlantic Ocean.
Here you can enjoy breathtaking sea views and breathe in the fresh air.
neighborhood_overview:
This is a little oasis in the middle of nature next to the sea and Ericeira. We are literally in the middle of nature. It's surrounded by hills, lush valleys, rivers and dramatic cliffs bordering the Atlantic Ocean.
Here you can enjoy breathtaking sea views and breathe in the fresh air.

We will be ”behind the scenes” of Ericeira, in the majestic cliff overlooking Praia de São Julião.

São Julião: A beach and a village crossed by a river which marks the borders of Sintra Natural Park.

Sintra Natural Park, recognized worldwide by UNESCO, has on its south coast all the crown jewels. This leaves its northernmost side at the mercy of those who have a greater affinity with the unknown. The Beach of São Julião is one of those places that escape the obvious and wins it at all.
host_about:
I am an explorer of great ideas and their practical links to every day challenges, personal development teacher, guide towards growth and grounding.

I am driven by sustainability businesses and all the best bits: creativity and challenges!

I nurtured a passion for Nature and my travelling.

name: Private Beachhouse with pool
description: The fully equipped & private beach villa is located in Areia Branca near Lourinhã, one hour north of Lisbon and 15 minutes south of Peniche. The villa is suitable for larger groups up to 17 persons as well as for 2-3 families. The comfortable house is located only 4 minutes walking distance from the surfing beach "Praia do Areal", a beautiful beach. In summer the house serves as a surf camp, in "winter" (November to March) it is rented exclusively to groups & families.

name: Studio Rainha Santa entre o Mar e o Verde
description:
Modern and comfortable, this brand new Studio offers all the amenities to make you feel at home and enjoy an invigorating holiday.
The toilet with shower cabin and towel dryer,
For couples traveling with their baby, the space is safe and have travel crib available and high chair
Built-in double bed, which falls perfectly on top of the couch, with the previous removal of the back and pillows of the same, during the day, the bed made is collected and the sofa composed
neighborhood_overview:
Leaving the Studio we arrive on foot in 5 minutes, to restaurants, supermarkets, pharmacies, public transport and to places of interest like the " Casa da Guia"
old palace of the century. XIX, where the invitation to gastronomy is made with seaside terraces, and a commercial space of exquisite taste inside the palace.
From here, you can continue on foot along the cycle path past the " Boca do Inferno" (Hell's Mouth), a place of interest in natural beauty, and continue enjoying the palatial houses where once exiled Kings lived.
On a journey that will take about 20 minutes to reach the center of the village of Cascais, where everything around you speaks of Culture, Gastronomy and fun.
Come visit this Charming Village, and I will be happy to welcome you!

name: INthePark Rooms
description:
In a privileged location, next to Eduardo VII Park. If you want the best location in Lisbon, this is the place for you. Next to public transport (4 min walk to the metro and 15 minutes to the historical center of the city).

The property is a shared apartment with 5 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, all with sunlight and spacious, some with an unobstructed view of the street, with Wi-Fi, providing you with a relaxing atmosphere.

Here you can visit the charming city of Lisbon.
neighborhood_overview:
This is a quiet neighborhood, in a hotel area 2 minutes from a beautiful garden (Parque Eduardo VII), a lung in the center of Lisbon, with large green areas with a breathtaking view over the city and the river, with excellent terraces to finish or start your day, probably walking.
Leaving the garden, you are in Marquês de Pombal, with Av. da Liberdade at your feet and the metro that can take you everywhere. The neighborhood is quiet and safe, you were all you needed for your normal day, restaurants, cafes, pharmacy, banks.
The surrounding areas are full of commerce, where you can find everything you need for your normal day, shopping centers (El Corte Inglês 5 min.)

Looking for a stay at the best location in the city? This apartment is next to:
- Largest park in the center of Lisbon (Eduardo VII Park)
- Avenida da Liberdade ( one of the main Avenues of Lisbon)
- The historic center is 20 min. walk away
- Large Co-work space 2 minutes away on

name: Cozy apartment in BEST location - Mouraria
description: Welcome to Lisbon! This city has a unique personality that combines beautiful architecture, amazing whether and food, and 7 hills that provides one of the bests views in Europe.My place is a one bedroom apartment located in Mouraria, one of the most authentic neighborhoods in the Old Town. You can easily walk to the main attractions: Martin Moniz (3 min); Praça do Comércio (15 min) Elevador de Santa Justa (11 min); Castelo de São Jorge (14 min) Miradouro Senhora do Monte (11 min)and much more.
host_about: Hi!! my name is Laís, I am 31 years old and I am from Brazil. I live in Lisboa for 6 years and I am tour guide in this beautiful city. My passion for tourism made me think that I could also host people at my place while I travel, a cozy apartment in Mouraria, one of the most authentic areas of Lisbon. The neighbourhood is really well located in the downtown area, close to everything that you need to see. I will be very happy to meet you and to welcome you in your holidays.

description:

There are nearby supermarkets and shops all within walking distance. Colombo shopping centre is nearby which provides easy access to do shopping. Benfica Stadium is also close by. One can easily reach the city centre with the metro. There are also bus services available.
neighborhood_overview: The Neighborhood is usually quite and peaceful. The apartment itself has a great location, only a 5 minutes walk to the metro station which makes it an excellent Location. The metro stop is (Pontinha), which is part of the blue metro line. This links to everywhere in the city centre including all the main touristic spots. There are also supermarkets downstairs, Continent supermarket (5 minutes walk), coffee shops, hairdressers, a restaurant and other amenities in and around the area, just downstairs the apartment.

name: CharmingRoom CItyCenter
description:
In a privileged location, next to Eduardo VII Park. If you want the best location in Lisbon, this is the place for you. Next to public transport (4 min walk to the metro and 15 minutes to the historical center of the city).
The property is a shared apartment with 5 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, all with sunlight and spacious, some with an unobstructed street view, with wifi, providing you with a relaxing atmosphere.
Here you can visit the charming city of Lisbon.
neighborhood_overview:
This is a quiet neighborhood, in a hotel area 2 minutes from a beautiful garden (Parque Eduardo VII), a lung in the center of Lisbon, with large green areas with a breathtaking view over the city and the river, with excellent terraces to finish or start your day, probably walking.
Leaving the garden, you are in Marquês de Pombal, with Av. da Liberdade at your feet and the metro that can take you everywhere. The neighborhood is quiet and safe, you were all you needed for your normal day, restaurants, cafes, pharmacy, banks. The surrounding areas are full of commerce, where you can find everything you need for your normal day, shopping centers (El Corte Inglês 5 min.)

Looking for a stay at the best location in the city? This apartment is next to: - Largest park in the center of Lisbon (Eduardo VII Park), - Avenida da Liberdade ( one of the main Avenues of Lisbon) - The historic center is 20 min. on foot - Large Co-work space 2 min walking.

name: Magical, award-winning cosy hobbit house
description: Hidden away in the bottom of an organic quinta is an award winning Hobbit House. The house was designed with deep respect and harmony within the energy of the land and the the surrounding mountains where it was built. Constructed using simple materials, this tiny house measuring only 30 square metres, consists of an inter-connected kitchen featuring sea views, a dining area, wood burning stove, bathroom and mezzanine bed. It is a magical space of calm, invoking reflection and creativity.

description: Villa sintra is on one floor, and consists of two apartments, ‘Geranium’ and ‘Jasmin’, linked by separating doors. They are combined as one unit to make ‘Villa Sintra’, for up to 14 people, within a 5000m2 estate with gardens and swimming pool.
neighborhood_overview:
The house is ideally situated in a rural setting, at the foot of the Sintra hills, 3km from beautiful Guincho beach and 6km from cosmopolitan Cascais and Estoril. This is a perfect location for nature lovers, being in the Sintra-Cascais protected National Park where building is very restricted.
The village of Malveira da Serra is less than five minutes walk away, with a range of shops and restaurants. The village retains its traditional charm as building is restricted, and has long been sought after due to the beauty of its setting, with the coast stretched out below, and the forest and mountains above.

neighborhood_overview: It is located in the heart of the city, between Amoreiras, Estrela and Prazeres. It is a residential neighborhood, but with a very strong and ancient vocation for commerce. Campo de Ourique is a neighborhood with a life of its own, it looks like a small village within Greater Lisbon. It is often referred to as the quietest neighborhood in the city of Lisbon and the one with the best living conditions, differentiating it from other urban areas that depend excessively on Shopping Centers. Weekdays and weekends seem indistinguishable, as the peaceful and paradoxically dynamic movement of people traverses the neighborhood every day of the week at the same pace.

name: Villa Loureiro
description:
Welcome to Villa Loureiro in Cascais!

Located just outside the centre of Cascais, between Costa da Guia and Quinta da Marinha areas, this exclusive high-end villa offers unique outdoor areas and privacy, as near as you could be to the centre of Cascais.

With a great pool, garden, BBQ, within walking distance to Casa da Guia and the centre of Cascais

For up to 10 ad + 2 child.
4 + 1 (optional) Bedrooms, 5 + (1 optional)Bathrooms
Open plan living areas, opening onto private garden
neighborhood_overview:
Close to downtown Cascais and all its amenities, the villa is situated in the very sought after Guia residential area in Cascais, a short walk from Casa da Guia and its magnificent cliff-top restaurants.

The charming, historic town centre of Cascais is at a distance of 2 minutes by car. There is plenty to visit such as restaurants, nightlife, cultural events, cinemas with films in English and shopping.
This property is ideally situated for those wanting to take a break with plenty to do but without having to rent a car.

Guincho Beach
Hip and famous Guincho Beach, world renowned for its natural beauty and surfing, is a quick 5 minute drive away, along a spectacular scenic road, where once drove the world’s most popular spy. You can go there by car, walking or cycling through a promenade created for this purpose willfully, it is a very pleasant ride of 20 minutes. This is a perfect beach for water sports such as surf, kitesurf and windsurf.

name: Loft in Lisbon Brooklyn Hood
description:
Come and enjoy this loft nestled in the heart of Beato, the local Brooklyn. Close to the Palacio do Grilo and the most unusual art galleries in the city. You discovered the calm and sweetness of living in a peaceful and typically Portuguese neighborhood!
A little extra: a French bakery just opened a stone's throw from the house.
host_about:
Anne Colin has been learning, growing and discovering over the last few years around  the world and more recently in Portugal.

A Ilegítima has become her multiverse playground.

It’s a table where she organizes private dinners for people to meet and discuss wellness, personal growth, kink and life. It’s a place where you eat a colorful and nourishing palate. Where you get real with the people sitting at the table with you. 

It’s a philosophy where anything is possible as long as you believe in yourself with love and passion.

A Ilegítima is also her own personal discovery, it’s herstory. 

A Ilegitima is always on the lookout for an adventure. Traveling is Anne’s passion. She lives as an unofficial tour guide of Lisbon, talking to people at neighboring tables or benches, giving hints of her favorite spots in the city where people eat well and share good times. Recently, she finally connected with a long-cherished dream : becoming a motobiker. And she is now travelling on her own in Portugal wild countryside.

name: 2BDR Charm in Belém's Heart by LovelyStay
description:
"2BDR Charm in Belém's Heart" in Lisbon sleeps 4 people in a queen bed and 2 single beds. The apartment has a bathroom, a living room with a TV and a comfortable sofa, free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and a fully equipped kitchen.

You are required to sign a Lease Agreement after booking this property and to pay a Security Deposit.

Note: The monthly rent includes all expenses.
neighborhood_overview:
Our apartment is located right in the heart of the Belém quarter, famous for its historical monuments and museums!

This special neighborhood gained its importance thanks to the harbor where the boats that sailed off to discover the “new world” during the 15th & 16th centuries. Back in 1497, the explorer Vasco da Gama and his fleet left the Belém harbor and took 1 year to sail to what is now the country of India!

Some popular attractions that can be found in Belém:

- TORRE DE BELEM: The tower was built between 1515-1521 and it is considered to be the symbol of Lisbon. It is a prominent example of the Portuguese Manueline style.

- MOSTEIRO DOS JERÓNIMOS: The monastery is, along with the Tower of Belém, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, and one of the most visited monuments of Portugal.

- PASTÉIS DE BELEM: The famous custard tarts of the country were first baked at this pastry shop and can still be enjoyed from the now popular tiled past

neighborhood_overview:
Oeiras is a charming coastal town located in the Lisbon region of Portugal. With its stunning beaches, parks, and cultural landmarks, it has become a popular destination for tourists from all over the world. The town is known for its beautiful coastline, which offers a range of water sports and activities, as well as its tranquil parks and green spaces, such as the Oeiras Park.

In addition to its natural beauty, Oeiras is also a hub for research and development, with several high-tech companies and institutions in the area. The town is home to the Taguspark Technology Park, which is one of the largest of its kind in Europe. Taguspark hosts several research centers, innovation hubs, and startups, as well as many international companies and organizations.

neighborhood_overview:
Graça is a charming neighborhood located in Lisbon. Known for its quiet and picturesque atmosphere, it offers a unique blend of tradition and modernity.
Situated in the hills of Lisbon, Graça offers breathtaking views over the city and the Tagus River. It is located northeast of the historic center, not far from equally charming districts such as Alfama and São Vicente.
The architecture is diverse, ranging from charming old buildings with colorful tiles and wrought iron balconies to some more modern constructions. Narrow cobbled streets add a touch of authenticity to the neighborhood.
Graça is famous for the Miradouro da Graça, a lookout point where visitors can enjoy a spectacular panoramic view over Lisbon, but not only that, you'll also find small stores, cozy cafés, and traditional restaurants serving Portuguese delicacies. The neighborhood is frequented by locals and tourists alike, creating a vibrant atmosphere.

neighborhood_overview:
Get to know the Chiado neighborhood of Lisbon, one of the most famous in the city, and learn all it has to offer! With sights, coffee shops, theaters, important streets and more, the Chiado Neighborhood is considered a bohemian neighborhood of the Portuguese capital, where nightlife boils.
Located between the neighborhoods of Baixa Pombalina and Alto neighborhood, right in the heart of Lisbon, Chiado is a really unmissable region. The place has always had its charm for being a stronghold of artists, poets, writers and intellectuals of Lisbon. Nowadays, Chiado is one of the most sought-after spots for tourists who want to know the neighborhood's famous sights, such as the ancestral Bertrand Bookstore, which has been open since 1732.

Welcome to my Cozy Room in our Minimalist, sunlit Apartment with an Office Space and river View in Belem. Embrace the tranquility of a quiet neighborhood, just 5 minutes from open transport, 15 minutes to both the city center and the beach.

Whether you long for a cozy retreat or eager to uncover local hidden gems, i am here for you.

name: 2BDR Alcântara Nest by LovelyStay
description:
Discover "2BDR Alcântara Nest by LovelyStay": a chic 2-bedroom retreat in Lisbon. Recently renovated, sleeping 5 in a Queen bed, a bunk bed and extra bed, and complete with a stylish bathroom, AC, free Wi-Fi and a fully equipped kitchenette, it's your gateway to Lisbon's charm. Book now and enjoy a memorable stay!

You are required to sign a **Lease Agreement** after booking this property and to pay a **Security Deposit**.
Note: Monthly rent includes all the expenses
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to Alcântara, a vibrant and historic neighborhood nestled along the Tagus River in Lisbon. This charming district seamlessly blends traditional Portuguese character with modern amenities, making it an ideal location for your next home.

Location:
Situated just west of the city center, Alcântara offers the perfect balance between urban living and tranquility. Enjoy the convenience of being close to Lisbon's main attractions while savoring the peaceful atmosphere along the riverbanks.

Scenic River Views:
One of Alcântara's standout features is its stunning views of the Tagus River. Imagine waking up to the sight of the river gently flowing, creating a serene backdrop for your daily life.

Historic Charm:
The neighborhood boasts a rich history, evident in its architecture and cobblestone streets. Explore narrow alleys that lead to hidden gems, including historic buildings and traditional Portuguese cafes.

Cultural Diversity:

name: CSM - Apartamentos Um Quarto
description:
Mouraria is one of the most emblematic neighborhoods in Lisbon, located in close proximity to the Castle and the City Centre.

Just a 5-minute walk from the heart of the city and a 10-minute walk to the imposing Castle and the charming Alfama area.

Our one-bedroom apartments are the ideal choice for couples looking for a romantic getaway or for small families looking to explore Lisbon!
neighborhood_overview: It is said that this is where our dear Fado was born. The music of the people rose to prominence in the Portuguese aristocracy thanks to the famous Severa, who, supported by the Count of Vimioso, enchanted with his voice in the bullfights and the feasts of the nobility. Today, Mouraria is known as Lisbon's most multicultural neighborhood and is in the spotlight of real estate investors. Make sure to visit the Taborda Theatre and the Chapitô.
host_about:
Somos a Margarida, a Joana, e a Marta, faremos o nosso melhor para tornar a sua estadia memorável!

Gerimos alguns apartamentos nos bairros mais conhecidos no coração Lisboa!

Estaremos sempre contactáveis por telefone para fornecer todas  as respostas para as suas perguntas!

Esperamos por si em Lisboa!

name: Cosy, modern flat with terrace
description: Amazing stay in the hip part of Lisbon, minutes away from lovely Monte Agudo viewpoint overlooking the city. On a quiet and beautiful one-way street, this 60’s inspired apartment is just minutes away from the liveliness of bars and restaurants in Anjos, Intendente and Graça. Large private terrace and small balcony, in a building with an elevator. The flat comfortably fits 2 guests with a comfy Emma mattress. There is also a sofa bed in the living room that fits another 2 guests.
host_about: We are a fun couple in our 30’s who love Lisbons nightlife as well as Portugals nature, Sintra being a favourite not far away. We also enjoy relaxing on the patio with a book or doing yoga which there’s space for! And on weekends we enjoy cycling or surfing - a beginner surfboard is free for anyone wanting to try - Caparica is a recommended beach! Comfort and a tidy, cosy workspace is essential to us and hope you find this is for you too!

name: Bright 2BDR Duplex With Balcony by LovelyStay
description:
This lovely and well-equipped 2 bedroom duplex apartment is located in the restored and multicultural neighborhood of Arroios, with a great public transportation network, close to supermarkets, stores, and restaurants, and centrally located to easily explore the center of Lisbon. Here you can enjoy the grandeur of the city in a quintessentially Portuguese neighborhood!
Staying here will certainly make your trip to Lisbon authentic and memorable!
neighborhood_overview:
In the multicultural neighborhood of Arroios, in Lisbon, the new coexists with the classic, and diversity is everywhere. a dynamic and multifaceted place in the heart of the city of Lisbon, close to supermarkets, stores, and restaurants. The neighborhood is only 10 minutes away, by subway, from the uptown area, and by bus from the center of Lisbon.

A few places worth exploring nearby:

ROSSIO: Rossio has been a traditional meeting point for the people of Lisbon dating back to the 18th century. Some of the cafés and shops in the square, such as the Café Nicola, were frequented by famous poets such as Manuel Maria Barbosa du Bocage. Other traditional shops include the Pastelaria Suíça and the Ginjinha, where the traditional Portuguese liqueur (Ginjinha) can be tasted.

J’aime voyager et découvrir le monde… lorsque je voyage je vie des expériences incroyables...  souvent grâce aux « bonnes adresses »  des locaux ...  Alors j'ai décidé de me lancer. 

Je serais ravi de vous accueillir chez moi, de pouvoir vous aider à passer un séjour agréable et vous recommander des activités pour toute la famille. J'espère que vous passerez d’excellentes vacances! 

Pour pouvoir préparer votre séjour et le rendre encore plus agréable n'hésitez pas à me contacter si vous avez la moindre question !
Très bon séjour à bientôt !

name: Lisbon Hidden Oasis With Pool by LovelyStay
description:
Welcome to your serene retreat, "Lisbon Hidden Oasis w/ Pool by LovelyStay"! Featuring 2 Queen bedrooms, it sleeps 4 people comfortably.
Complete with Air Conditioning, Free Wi-Fi and a fully equipped kitchenette, the apartment offers everything you'll need for your stay.
Take a refreshing dip in the pool or just enjoy the sun in the balcony or garden and experience the best of Lisbon living in this delightful oasis!
neighborhood_overview:
The property is located in Beato, one of the oldest parishes in Lisbon, with its borders protecting the riches of a world apart. It is a place of ancient farms and mansions and royal buildings, such as the Beato Convent, among the most important of Lisbon's heritage.
A residential area near Santa Apolónia, it is a very calm area halfway to the city center and also to the Expo area where there is a shopping center with many international stores, cafes, and restaurants right in front of the Tagus River. In front of the shopping center, there is also a train to the rest of Portugal! Near the apartment, there are also many new restaurants, green spaces, and bike paths that connect the area of Beato to downtown.
